content: अवग्रह् {c9c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To let loose, let go (as reins). {@--2@} To divide, separate (as words or parts of words); पितृपाणमित्यत्र हि पितृ पाणमित्यृकारोऽवगृह्यते <ls>P. VIII. 2. 46</ls> <ab>Com.</ab> {@--3@} To break off, discontinue; to distinguish, discriminate, discern. {@--4@} To punish, chastise; मंदोपि नाम न महानवगृह्य साध्यः <ls>Śi. 5. 49.</ls> {@--5@} To seize, choke; गद्गदिकावगृह्यमाणकंठा <ls>K. 307</ls>, <ls n="K.">328.</ls> {@--6@} To capture, take in possession, overpower; स्वामिनमवशमवगृह्णंति <ls>Dk. 157</ls>; <ls>Dk. 32</ls>; <ls>Ve. 46.</ls> {@--7@} To oppose, resist, hinder, obstruct. {@--8@} To lay hold of (with the feet). {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To knead, make dough.
